summary: Set in the Little Saigon district outside of Sydney, a woman (Blanchett) trying to escape her past becomes embroiled in a drug deal.
cast: Cate Blanchett|Sam Neill|Hugo Weaving|Martin Henderson|Noni Hazlehurst|Dustin Nguyen|Joel Tobeck|Lisa McCune|Susie Porter|Nina Liu|Linda Cropper|Daniela Farinacci|Ferdinand Hoang|Anh Do|Jason Chong|Anthony Brandon Wong|Bic Runga|Natasha Beaumont|Lisa Bailey|Lan Tran|Westley Wong|Andrew Tran|Thi Lan Nguyen|Thi Ngoc Nga Nguyen|Penny Pederson|Jacqueline Mikhail|Harli Ames|Anthony Phelan|Steve Vella|Rachel Aveling|Ian Roberts|Georgia Emerton|Alex Cook|Rebecca Bell|Samuel Patterson|Peter Tkacz|Lily Nguyen|John Nguyen|Terry Serio|Khiet Hoang|Jazz Ly|Sarah Woods|Amy Pedersen|Stella Ha Vi Do|Jon Sivewright|Rudi Tuisk|Jessamie Dunton-Rose|Craig Forrest|Igor Breakenback|Michael Ienna
title: Little Fish
